original_title: 避暑地の背徳夫人 ～陰欲に堕とされた美人妻～
overview: A work supervised by Kenzo Nagira. Reiko Okura, the wife of a conglomerate group officer, is ordered by her husband to go to a summer resort one day. A young man I meet there. Reiko has a strong sense of chastity, but she is gradually attracted to the strength and kindness of the young man. The contact with the young man fills the gap in Reiko's lonely heart. Reiko drowned in an immoral relationship.
title: Corruption at a Summer Resort － Beautiful Married Woman Falls into Dark Desires
